00023 #ifndef __libconfig_scanctx_h
00024 #define __libconfig_scanctx_h
00025 
00026 #include "libconfig.h"
00027 #include "strbuf.h"
00028 
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 #include <sys/types.h>
00031 
00032 #define MAX_INCLUDE_DEPTH 10
00033 
00034 struct scan_context
00035 {
00036   config_t *config;
00037   const char *top_filename;
00038   const char *files[MAX_INCLUDE_DEPTH];
00039   void *buffers[MAX_INCLUDE_DEPTH];
00040   FILE *streams[MAX_INCLUDE_DEPTH];
00041   int depth;
00042   strbuf_t string;
00043   const char **filenames;
00044   unsigned int num_filenames;
00045 };
00046 
00047 extern void scanctx_init(struct scan_context *ctx, const char *top_filename);
00048 extern const char **scanctx_cleanup(struct scan_context *ctx,
00049                                     unsigned int *num_filenames);
00050 
00051 extern FILE *scanctx_push_include(struct scan_context *ctx, void *prev_buffer,
00052                                   const char **error);
00053 extern void *scanctx_pop_include(struct scan_context *ctx);
00054 
00055 #define scanctx_append_string(C, S)             \
00056   strbuf_append(&((C)->string), (S))
00057 
00058 extern char *scanctx_take_string(struct scan_context *ctx);
00059 
00060 extern const char *scanctx_current_filename(struct scan_context *ctx);
00061 
00062 #endif /* __libconfig_scanctx_h */
